attributes.action: Protect All Children by having paedophiles chemically  castrated when found Guilty of child abuse.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
paedophilia is an illness, and can not be cured, to safe guard all children, paedophiles must be chemically castrated, before being set free to live in the community.
I therefore ask for "chemical castration for all convicted paedophiles."

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Protect All Children by having paedophiles chemically castrated when found Guilty of child abuse."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22519


Prime Minister's Office
